description: Winword can be abused as a LOLBIN to download arbitary file or load arbitary DLLs
name: Winword LOLBIN Usage
query: ((process.executable:*\\WINWORD.exe OR winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"WinWord.exe") AND (process.command_line:(*http\:\/\/* OR *https\:\/\/*) OR process.command_line:(*\/l\ * OR *.dll*)))
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali
